    Class
    Description
    AdminFrame
    Admin interface for the Library Management System.

    AuthenticationException
    Exception thrown when authentication fails.

    Service interface for authentication operations.
    AuthServiceImpl
    Implementation of the authentication service.
    BookFineStrategy
    Fine calculation strategy for books.
    BusinessException
    Exception thrown when a business rule is violated.
    CDFineStrategy
    Fine calculation strategy for CDs.

    FineCalculator
    Calculator for library fines using the Strategy pattern.

    FineStatus
    Constants for fine status values.
    FineStrategy
    Strategy interface for calculating fines based on overdue days.

    Notifier
    Observer-like interface for notification mechanisms.
    PaymentService
    Service interface for payment operations.
    PaymentServiceImpl
    Implementation of the payment service.
    ReminderService
    Service for sending reminder notifications to users.
    Reservation
    Represents a reservation for a media item.
    ReservationFeatureTest
    Manual test to verify Reservation feature works with actual database.
    ReservationRepository
    Repository interface for managing reservations.
    ReservationService
    Service interface for managing item reservations.
    ReservationServiceImpl
    Implementation of ReservationService.
    ReservationStatus
    Constants for reservation status values.
    UIHelper
    Utility class for common UI operations across different frames.
